channel.title: :d
channel.description: So I wanted to be nice today, so I took out 5m (half my bank l0l) and gave 100 people 50k each! I did it because of the shitty community on RS nowadays.. Do you guys do this stuff too? Opinions?

item.title: :d
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I do sometimes, will just be like Hi heres 100k for free. Done it like 5 times this week varying from 20k-1m. Depends on my mood.

Read full topic

item.title: :d
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Well I’ve given away tons of cash, but I think the most i gave away was when I was like level 70, which was like 260k or something, back in like 2006 or something, when that was a fuckton of cash to me :3

Read full topic

item.title: :d
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Sometimes I just completely lose the urge to play the game and randomly trade somebody and give them bank.
Then I start from scratch a month later when I feel like playing again lol…

Read full topic

item.title: :d
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I did a random drop party at the grand exchange once. Dropped a whip first, then 5 minutes later a d scim, d long, d square, and a saradomin sword. A lot of people were freaking out because they didn’t get anything, but one guy was just talking to me and not caring about it at all. I asked if he wanted anything, and he jokingly said a dfs, so I bought him one (this was back when it was ~15m). So yeah, he was shocked xD Made my day though.

Read full topic

item.title: :d
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

Sometimes I do random drop partys at GE with full bronze sets all boxed up (the boxes are huge).

Read full topic

item.title: :d
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

i used to do this, buying noobs fully rune or something, most of them really were unappreciative and just asked for more.

Read full topic

item.title: :d
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I gave people tips in lumbridge. Went something like this

-me : giving out free tips
-bots roam around
-me : giving away phr33 tips
-bots continue to move
-me giving away free tips to first ten people get them while you can!
-some noob goes ill take a tip!
-me: start harvesting early this year

Read full topic

item.title: :d
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

When I was mining for 99, I gave out all the mithril ore I mined. Does this count?

Read full topic

item.title: :d
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

No, they beg too much and then when I say no, they attempt to scam other people with ‘doubling money’.

Read full topic
